112.content:
The following takes place after Tooty talks to Bottles from the original game.

"Aha! there you are my pretty!" Grunty the Witch lands in front of Tooty.

Tooty jumped. "Ah! What do you want from me?"

Grunty laughed "Your too beautiful for your own good!" Grunty goes to grab Tooty and they get into a fight.
112.title: magic

choices: "I can't believe i lost my thin, beautiful figure!"
"Banjo... your sister wants to have a word with you....NOW!
1121.content:
"Let me go you dirty old hag!" Tooty yelled as she fought the Witch off the best she could.

"Don't Scratch and Bite, my little bear, you'll soon need bigger underwear!"

With one final grabbing motion, Grunty grabbed Tooty and jumped onto her broom. "Come on you old broom, we must show this bear her doom!" Grunty laughed as Tooty tried to struggle... but it was no use, Grunty the Witch had practically sealed her fate! Grunty landed in her lair, Klungo looked up surprised. "Your baaack ssssoo sooon missstresss Grunty?"
"Yea i am Klungo, did you expect me to take that long? Ha! This little girl knows how to fight... we'll see how that works after im done with you!" She throws Tooty into one of the machines. "let me out! i don't want to be ugly and fat!" "You'll like being fat... trust me... NOW SHUT UP YOU TWERP!" With that, Grunty slammed the door and locked it. She then walked into the second machine and walked in before shutting the door. "Turn it up Klungo, i need full power!"

Klungo started moving a lever forward. "Yesss Grunty." Sparks flew from the machines, and they bobbed up and down. Tootie felt a tickling feeling in her stomach and felt like she was expanding. "Help me Banjo, i feel all funny...."

The machines stopped and Klungo opened the door of the machine Grunty was in. "Misssstressss....you're..." Grunty interrupted. "That's right Klungo, Grunty went on weight watchers and now is as beautiful as ever! Now lets see how that brat turned out!

The door to the machine Tooty was in opens and she walks out. She examines herself in a mirror.
1121.title: continue the story!

11212.content:
"I can't believe i lost my thin, beautiful figure!" Tooty began to cry as she sat down and covered her face with her big green hands, which were close to resting on her much bigger green belly. "Why me...Why me..." She continued to cry as Grunty walked over. "Not enjoying how you look fatty?" Tooty looked up, tears in her eyes. "I don't think your... ready yet!" Grunty poked one of her long, skinny fingers into Tooty's green flesh. "Nope, not ready one bit... we got some work to do on you girl!" She laughed for a bit as Tooty looked at Grunty with fear in her eyes. "Please! Please i don't harm me! I'm not even hungry! I just want to go home!" She starting bawling. Grunty looked at the sobbing girl. "Dont worry deary... you ain't going to escape... especially when im done with you! Eheheheheeee!!" She walked to the other side of the room "Klungo! Klungo you half witted twit!" Klungo ran over as fast as he could, which looked more like a limping jog. "Yesss Missstresss?"

Grunty looked at the ceiling and thought for a moment. "Bring me..."

get it over with, grunty pours caldron's liquid into her mouth!

"Are you gonna listen to me or am i gonna have to do the spell myself?" The caldron looked up at Grunty. "Gruntilda you are cruel and mean, i shall never do a dirty deed like from what you plea." Grunty kicked the caldron but just stubbed her toe. "Grrr! you blasted pot! Why must beautiful people such as thee have to do what dirty kettles should do?!" Grunty put a spell on the liquid inside the caldron and it turns orange. A straw, that looks more like see through garden hose appears. Grunty handed Tooty the hose and smirked. "Start drinking Blubber Bear." Tooty looked at the hose then at the Bubbling orange liquid. "I'm not thirsty..." "i didn't asked if you were thirsty or not! i said drink the liquid!" Tooty took a few small sips before giving a yuck face. If you were paying attention, you would think that her face became a little greener. "It tastes nasty..." Grunty nodded her head. "What did you think it would taste like? Ice cream and sugar plums?!"
112121.title: "....the caldron!"

1121212.content:
Tooty Gagged. "I.... i just cant drink anymore..." She looked a bit sick from the liquid. Grunty, strutted up to the green bear...creature...thingy. "Now listen here deary... I DON'T CARE HOW YOU FEEL! I want you bigger! Because i can either use you at Witchyworld or keep you as personal stress toy! (if you chose this later on, it only counts as lesbian if they try to have sexual intercourse and/or kissing.) Grunty put a spell on the liquid and seem to have a mind as it own as it shot out of the pot and...went for Tooty's mouth! Tooty started to expand, mainly her belly. The green blob began to expand, getting bigger and bigger... Her old pants, which survived her first expansion from the transformation, ripped, revealing some pink underwear. When Tooty finished the liquid with a loud "Slurp!" she fell backwards. She had nearly doubled her size. "ooooh... my tummy hurts" Tooty groaned in a slight pain. Grunty managed to jump on Tooty's belly, being young once more, she had a lot more energy. Tooty looked up and saw the thin, witch grin down at her. "Please.... turn me back to the way i was...." Grunty just laughed. "Not in your life time you will! I have Big plans for you! Ehehehe!!" Grunty jumped off, wondering whether to give Mr. Patch an Early Birthday Present, or keep Tooty for herself.

Grunty rubbed her chin. "Hm... this is a hard decision... i choose..."
1121212.title: get it over with, grunty pours caldron's li...

11212121.content:
".... to give you to Mr. Patch." Grunty said with a grin. Tooty got up (after some struggle) and realized she was in her panties! Grunty laughed and with a wave of her hand, made it so that her pants had grown back to fit her larger gut. Grunty, personally rolled Tooty down to Witchy World. "Where are you taking me?!" Cried Tooty, practically scared out of her wits looking around at what she was seeing. "Oh nothing special..." Grunty began with a smile. "Just a giant dinosaur that might have some fun with you....ehehehe!!!"

When Grunty pushed the Fat green bear into the big blue tent with White stripes, She stationed Tooty so she wasn't on her feet, but wasn't exactly sitting down, so she couldn't roll away or anything. "Oh Mr. Patch... early birthday present for you my deary!" With that, Grunty skipped out of the Tent as Tooty wobbled in fear. "Oh no!" she thought, "What is he going to do with me!" Just then, Mr. Patch walked in as his usual size (When Banjo and Kazooie first met him). Tooty was almost the size of his leg. "Oh my! oh my! A pretty young girl for Mr. Patch?" Mr. Patch began to say with a grin. "This is quite a surprise! What a Happy Birthday this will be for me!" He looked at Tooty. "Well, they never make girls my size... never did... So i'll just inflate you!" He let out a laugh that almost could've shook the tent. Tooty was frightened. "Please Mr. Patch, i want to go home!"

Mr. Patch grinned. "But little girl, this is your home! Now let me think of the most enjoyable way to inflate you... your the right sized girl for me, so i don't have to feed you any of the Witchy World food..." Tooty looked at the inflated dinosaur, she could see he was originally green with a yellow belly, but now had a few patches over him.

"...So i have decided to inflate you by..." Tooty snapped out of her inspecting trance and gazed at the dinosaur.
11212121.title: To Mr. Patch you go!

112121211.content:
Mr. Patch picked up Tooty and grinned. "Pucker up, honey bear!" Tooty gasped in shock, before she could say something, Mr. Patch locked his latex lips on her mouth and started to kiss... But something was different... he was blowing air into her! Tooty began to feel herself the best she can, and she was inflating! Not just in size, but... in height?! She looked at Mr. Patch, who was clearly enjoying the kiss. Tooty was sort of liking it... but couldn't decide whether she liked it or not.


After what felt like 2 hours, Tooty felt herself touch the ground, but now she was almost up to his neck! Mr. Patch chuckled. "I need a break... your almost ready, so, do you like your new form?" Tooty looked herself over... Her belly was still fat, but she gotten taller... and a bit wider in other areas, including her butt! (Mr. Patch couldn't help himself!) Tooty thought about an answer for Mr. Patch long and hard then finally replied....

After having seen his sister Tootie devour poor Kazooie poor Banjo was beside himself as he tried to figure what he could do until Mumbo Jumbo appeared and felt something was very wrong.

12.content: What story shall we go with?
12.title: Grunty the Witch

121.content:
One day, the evil and ugly witch Gruntilda Winkybunion was in her lair, thinking up an evil plan to destroy Banjo and Kazooie and take over Spiral Mountain. She found it really hard to concentrate with her stomach rumbling, and she knew it wouldn't stop until she had something to eat. She called for Klungo, her ogre minion who was a mad scientist and an expert at mechanical engineering.

"Klungo, get here right away! I need your assistance today!" yelled Grunty. Klungo came rushing up the stairs.

"Yessss, Misssstressss Grunty? What can Klungo do for you?" Klungo asked Grunty.

"I'm hungry, I want something to eat, something with lots of cheese and meat!" Grunty told Klungo.

"What sssspecificaly doessss Misssstressss Grunty have in mind?" Klungo asked Grunty.

"I'd love a meal of burgers and fries, but fatty foods go right to my thighs!" said Grunty. She loved to eat junk food, but she wasn't very fond of being fat, and with her metabolism, weight was easy to gain but hard to lose.

"How I long to be much thinner, then I can enjoy my dinner!" she said to Klungo as she held up a picture of her dream body, which was of her being thin.

"Perhapssss ssssuch a thing issss possssible." said Klungo.

"Tell me, Klungo, I'd like to know! This flabby body's got to go!" Grunty said to Klungo.

"Have you ever conssssidered eating more vegetablessss and lessss junk food?" Klungo asked Grunty. This infuriated Grunty, as she didn't like the idea of eating healthy.

"Don't question my eating habits! Vegetables are just for rabbits!" snarled Grunty.

"Ssssorry, Misssstressss Grunty." said Klungo meekly.

"Oh, how I hate to eat my greens, though I understand what you mean; A lovely body isn't easy when your favorite foods are greasy." lamented Grunty.

"Klungo undersssstandssss." said Klungo.

"There's got to be a better way to a thinner body today." Grunty said to Klungo.

"Maybe there issss, Misssstressss Grunty." said Klungo.

"Then what else do you have in mind? A better option I must find!" said Grunty.

What does Klungo suggest?
121.title: Story 1

135232.content:
Banjo the bear wasn't your ordinary video game character but in reality a 1500 lbs bear who was indeed huge and quite a wide load as well.

Of course this day was about to take an unexpected turn as that nude beach itself was hosting its annual nude beach Sumo tournament.

"Nude beach Sumo tournament? Oh wait i get it, this is when they host their annual nude beach Sumo tournament. Hmm should i enter this tournament or should i consult with both Tootie and Kazooie?" Banjo thought to himself.

Then after thinking carefully Banjo decided to....

14.content: The snarky bird is a good place to start, now which way shall she gain her prodigious lard?
14.title: Kazooie

choices: Had kept the svelte form of her glory days
Had gotten about a third fatter, much like her companion
Was even fatter: at least Banjo was getting some exercise!
141.content:
Spiral mountain had light shine down upon it one mid-day lunch much like any other. It was not a particularly remarkable day in any capacity, and in all likelihood would not be. Gruntilda had been defeated at least two times before over, and last time over four years ago. The mountain had been quiet and peaceful ever since.

Light crept into the window of Banjo and Kazooie's small cottage, awakening the red bregull. She knew that could only mean one thing: it was the crack of noon and time to get up to a big day of doing absolutely nothing. And why not? The duo had succeeded before and since then had not been doing much of anything. Already their days were filled mainly with eating and playing video games, and neither saw much problem with that. Kazooie greeted the day by flickering her eyes groggily and focusing into the noon light. She laid lazily in her backpack suspended on a rack beside Banjo's bed and reached over to tear another day off a calendar before finding it was just out of reach.

Mildly irritated, Kazooie pecked Banjo's head to wake him up.

"Wake up, Butterbear, it's almost 2 and I'm hungry"

Banjo got up soon after with relative slowness. "Alright, Iets just eat some leftovers" he said, getting a large pizza box stored in a cooler.

"And flip that calendar, I can't reach it."

He did so, turning it to the day's date: April 14th, 2005.

Banjo then hefted Kazooie from the rack and placed her beside him at the sink to wash up for the morning while their pizza warmed in the oven. Kazooie waited for her turn at the sink, her eyes wandering in the meantime. She noticed a seven year old picture of the two of them hanging on a nearby wall, with Banjo looking trim and muscular back in those days. Turning to him now, it was obvious his trim figure had melted away from endless honey and pizza to a figure with a prominent potbelly, and probably a good third more poundage than his prime. It was a fact Kazooie liked to make fun of.

Once Banjo had finished washing up, he let Kazooie begin in turn while he checked on the food. The red bird cleaned herself thoroughly; it would get quite humid when you mainly hang around in a backpack. Now was about time to have a bit of a stretch, she thought, leaving the well-worn pack and washing her feet in the water. Her eyes caught her reflection in the pool and glanced back at the years-old picture. She herself...
141.title: Overeating and laziness

1411.content: Kazooie was shocked to see she did not gain a pound for all the eating she had done over the last few years she looked at herself like she was in the old days she liked the way she looked in 2002. Wow damn, I look good even after 3 years? for eating junk like that Kazooie was happy. when Banjo asked am I dreaming you look as good as you did years ago, nope I am still the same as I was Her happiness ended when Banjo said. you can't stay like that here let me make you some food, Kazooie thought what should I do? she ended up doing
1411.title: Had kept the svelte form of her glory days

1413.content: Kazooie had large love handles on her sides, as well as an ample rump and enormous belly. she sighed as she gave her belly a squeeze and her rump a jiggle.
1413.title: Was even fatter: at least Banjo was getting som...

choices: "I heard there's a Sumo Tournament going on. Do you want to compete in it?"
14131.content: "I... I like my fat! It makes me look cuter!" replied Kazooie. She played with her fat body a little bit before realizing something. "I wish I was even fatter, then that way I'll be loved by many fans and they will want to rub my fat body!" Just then, Banjo tells her about something. "Hey Kazooie,..."
14131.title: she likes it

14133.content: Kazooie can't decide on her opinion. So she asked Banjo to do it. "Banjo, I can't decide whether I like myself being fat or not. What do you think?" Banjo replied...
14133.title: she wants Banjo's opinion

choices: After "breakfast", the Bear and Bird are lazing around as usual
141331.content:
Banjo was not a smart man...er, bear. But he was able to tell what Kazooie wanted to hear...probably. He used very sound logic to determine that Kazooie made fun of him for being fat, and therefore she considered fat a bad thing. And therefore, calling her fat would be bad, or at least make her angry. He decided to play it cool, and act like she wasn't fat at all. Great plan.

"Uh...What do you mean?" the 293 pound bear asked.

"You know," Kazooie said, gesturing to her 284 pound body. "All this! If you don't notice it, then you're just as dumb as you look!" She was indeed massive. Her titanic belly was packed with pizzas, sodas, cookies, fried chicken (odd that she was a cannibal), candy, more pizza, donuts, fries, hot dogs, more pizza, hamburgers, cupcakes, popcorn, chips, yet more pizza, ice cream, chocolate, waffles, and even more pizza. With her huge soft jiggly love handles, and at least 10 chins, not to mention her incredible rump, it was impressive Banjo could even budge her.

"Well, uh," Said Banjo, still wary. "You may have gotten a...little pudge, but hey! At least you're nowhere near my size!" Said Banjo as he rubbed his stomach.

"Hah! At least you know that much, you grizzly blob!" It had worked. Kazooie had stopped thinking her own fat, once she was distracted. "Anyway, I'm feeling pretty peckish. Maybe put in a second pizza."

"Oh, uh, sure thing Kazooie." Said Banjo as he reached back into the cooler, and took out another box, happy that he'd managed to keep Kazooie from getting mad at him.
141331.title: Play it cool

1413311.content:
Banjo was a little surprised at Kazooie. During breakfast, she'd eaten every single leftover pizza that they had. All seventeen. And to polish it off, seven buckets of fried chicken, forty hot dogs, twenty three burgers, and fourteen collective gallons of various kinds of soda.

Now he and Kazooie were sitting on their beanbag chair outside, relaxing and being generally lazy. Except, where Kazooie would usually be playing video games, she had spent the past three minutes waiting for the food she ordered on the phone. ...And she had spent the past eight minutes before that ordering food on the phone.

Her enormous, distended gut touched the ground, and was spilling over the tight blue backpack banjo wore, filled to the brim with her titanic lower half. Two giant, soft, rotund, jiggly buttocks the size of medicine balls were crammed in, stretching the fabric and constantly pressing against Banjo's back.
Beneath her absurdly bloated belly were her legs, oh her legs. How could I describe those legs, the thighs must have weighed forty pounds each at least, and they were massively swollen, the perfect support for her incredible ass. Below them were her incredible calves, weighing fifteen pounds each or more. Even her feet had gained a lair of fat, weighing over two pounds each, with her long toes swollen to the size of hot dogs. All that incredible mass packed into that tight, stretched backpack. Her unbelievable stomach couldn't fit in there, so it was pouring over the edge and touching the ground. Going up, her wings were pumped up with fat, and somewhat difficult for her to move. Her breast was shockingly huge, coated in a thick layer of blubber. Going around her torso, the seventeen oversized rolls of back fat she had could be used as a pillow when Banjo sat down with her. And leading up to her head was a massively thick neck, fifteen or sixteen chins, and on her face were two large, plump cheeks, that served as a lovely frame for her hungry, eager mouth, always open to food of any sort.

"Uh, Kazooie?" said Banjo, weighing in at 297 pounds.

"What is it?" replied Kazooie, who had grown a bit from the big breakfast, weighing in at a healthy 316 pounds.

"That food you ordered was for both of us, right?"

"What? Haaaahaha!" Kazooie's laughter sent ripples through her blubbery self, and her whole body shook like a jello cake. "You really are a glutton! Trying to get some of my meal. We each order our own, separate lunches, remember? That's how it's always been. Fatso!"

"Oh, yeah. Sorry. I guess I was just being greedy." Banjo said reluctantly. "...Hey Kazooie?"

"What now, you oBEARse thing you?"

"I was just jealous because even though we eat the same stuff, you're in better shape then me...also nice pun."

"Thank you! It's a gift of mine."

"Perfect health or a really good sense of humor?"

"Both!" said Kazooie, laughing, which jiggled her enormous body even more.

And people say I'm the dumb one Banjo thought, as he felt Kazooie's gigantic, soft, blob like form pressed against his, shaking, rippling, and jiggling immensely.
1413311.title: Video Games and lunch

choices: Banjo woke up, feeling a giant, jiggling, soft blob pushing into his back...
14133111.content:
Kazooie grabbed another box of donuts, pulled it open, poured the contents into her eager maw, then threw away the box carelessly. To wash it down, she grabbed a gallon of chocolate milk, and guzzled it all down, tossing the empty container aside. Still thirsty, she popped open a liter of soda, drank it all, then with a belch threw the bottle away too. She then decided she wanted the taste of chocolate milk back in her mouth, so she had another gallon or two. Thinking she could go for a little meat, she reached into a bag, and pulled out a bunch of thick, greasy, warm, calorie-packed cheeseburgers, stuffing as many as she could fit in her beak at once. After that, she took a quadruple decker cake, and shoved her fat, greedy, fat, hungry, fat, fat, FAT face into it, all the way up to the second of her twenty three chins, and getting frosting all over her beachball sized cheeks. After finishing the whole thing in a minute or two, and licking off all the icing she could, she took a extra large pizza with every topping available, dumped a bucket of fried chicken onto it, dipped it in a tub of bacon grease, and took a massive bite. In three more, she'd finished it, and washed it down by drinking the tub of grease.

She ate so ravenously, that it sent jiggles and ripples all throughout her unbelievable body. A thick lair of soft flab surrounded every inch of her rotund self, from her head, almost buried between her huge cheeks and sinking into her thick neck, to her feet, which had only avoided being swallowed by her incredibly swollen legs because they were also having a percentage of the fat settling on them, and had swollen enough to poke out of the spreading masses that were her legs. Her impossible stomach, which seemed filled to maximum capacity (though she kept filling it more and more and more) consisted of a huge globe of flesh with a roll of developed fat over it. It was gradually swelling bigger and bigger with every piece of food she greedily scarfed down. Resting comfortably atop her gut, were the two enormous jiggling spheres of her breasts. On her back were at least fifteen thick rolls of back fat that almost covered up her tail. Also, her ass had grown to an obscene size, each soft, plush, rippling cheek was almost the size of her gut. Well, not quite, but still pretty darn big and impressive. It had long since burst out of Banjo's backpack, and was showing no signs of shrinking as she continued to engorge herself on the calorie laden feast she'd ordered, her steadily increasing weight being a staggering 437 pounds.

Speaking of Banjo, by this point he had finished three pizzas and two liters of soda. He weighed 298 pounds, and had gotten tired of feeling Kazooie's jiggling, ever expanding body press into his back, so he'd gotten up and decided to go for a walk. After about five steps, bringing him three feet away from his original spot, he was panting, out of breath, and sat down. It occurred to him just how out of shape he really was. Sitting on the ground, he leaned forward, and felt his huge gut squish, preventing him from leaning forward all the way. As if it were some massive pillow (not nearly as massive as Kazooie's, however), he slowly...slowly...drifted off to sleep.

151.content: Why does Humba Wumba gain weight?
151.title: Humba Wumba

choices: King Jinjo tells her a new world has opened
Tootie tells her of trouble in Jinjo Village
1511.content:
Humba Wumba sat in her giant chair in he teepee which rested in Mayhem Temple. Humba is best known as the Shaman who was able to change Banjo and Kazooie into many things. She sat there bored out of her mind. The isle o' bags is safe from any evil and Gruntilda is dead.

Suddenly Mary Canary flew into her Teepee with a message tucked into her wing. Mary dropped it into her lap and left. Humba opened the note and read it.

"Dear Humba Wumba the Shaman, Banjo and Kazooie have gone on a years vacation and I the Jinjo king have decided to make you acting Hero until they return. Signed King Jinjo." Humba was certainly surprised by the news. 

So many thoughts filled her head. "Am I ready to go on a whole adventure? Will I have to transform myself to different objects to solve puzzles? Who will be the villain? What lands do I have to visit and how many jiggies do I have to collect?" she thought and thought until she thought it was time to take action. Humba put on her outfit from Nuts & Bolts. (http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...) and left the teepee on an adventure.

Humba travels through Mayhem temple beating enemies and collecting music notes along the way. She jumps into the portal leading tithe isle o'hags and......
1511.title: Has to be the hero

choices: The village throws a party with plenty of food
Humba leaves to Jolly Rogers for a drink
15112.content:
Humba walked about 4 steps out of the portal and all of the sudden Banjos litle sister Tooty runs up to the Indian Shaman in a panicked. "Oh my God it was horrible!" Tooty cried. "What's matter Little Bear?" "Quickly you have to come see." said Tooty pulling Hunba along. 

Humba followed Tooty down the path and through the cave. Leading to Jinjo village. "Something weird is going on in the white Jinjo house!" cried Tooty running back home. Humba could see the other Jinjo's surrounding the house at a distance. 

"Oh thank goodness you're here Humba!" said a red Jinjo.   "What is problem with village?" asked Humba. "The white Jinjo started acting very weird after it ate a bad burger this morning! And now....just go look!" it said pointing to the white Jinjo house.

Humba was also curious about what was going on. But she was also scared. But there was no room or time to be scared now. Humba had to be a Hero. Humba opened the door only to bed met by a repulsive odor. She covered her nose with her shirt and walked in. And Humba couldn't believe her eyes. The white Jinjo was a massive pile of stinky, slimy, greasy, sweaty, fat. It belched and did other things as it shoved piles of food into it's mouth. 

It couldn't weight less than 400 pounds and such for a little creature that's alot. Thought Humba. Suddenly the white Jinjo lays eyes on Humba. She became stunned and couldn't move. Although she became curious. With the long cheese stick she found on the floes she picked it up and jabbed the Jinjo's massive gut. This was followed by loud rumbling noises. "Hello *beeeeeeelllllch* Humba." the Jinjo belched right into Humba's face and she breathed some in. After the first belch was released the Jinjo keep belching and it looked like it was getting smaller. 

To Humba's surprise the Jinjo reverted to it's normal size. "I guess I was just Hungry." it said with a blush. Humba laughed it took the Jinjo outside to show everyone I was better. The whole village celebrated and cheered. Humba wiped the grease from her face that the Jinjo belched onto her. 

Then......
15112.title: Tootie tells her of trouble in Jinjo Village

info.brief_description: Banjo Kazooie WG , Any Banjo Kazooie character (can be be from other Banjo games!)
info.description:
Hello! This is a WG interactive where any character from the Banjo Kazooie franchise can...well, you know... GAIN WEIGHT!

Anything is allowed except:
Gay
lesbian
gains over 500 per chapter.

I prefer it not to go sexually... but hell, if you want, go for it!

PLEASE ADD!!!!
